00066 // HISTORY:
00067 //
00068 // -Separated tags to separate files and created this single header
00069 //  file to declare them all
00070 //
00071 // -Oct 30, 2005 
00072 //  A CIccTagCreator singleton class has been added to provide general
00073 //  support for dynamically creating tag classes using a tag signature.
00074 //  Prototype and private tag type support can be added to the system
00075 //  by pushing additional IIccTagFactory based objects to the 
00076 //  singleton CIccTagCreator object.
00077 //
00079

00094 #endif //_ICCTAG_H
